main event: The observer saw 2 objects the size of half dollars at an altitude of 5000 feet, which disappeared into clouds while traveling in a straight line.
interesting points: The objects were very bright snow color and appeared blue dark on the bottom., The sighting lasted approximately 5 seconds., The observer described the objects' movement as resembling a flight of birds., The weather was clear during the observation., There was not enough data available to form a valid conclusion about the nature of the sighting.
witness description: sales manager for American Import Co.
